runs.comm: short of a length outside off with good bounce, a bit of movement away from Guptill who wafts and is beaten
no wafting this time, a real crack off the back foot, he uses the width outside off to cut the ball so hard through point
backs away to create some hitting space but then checks his shot to play back to the bowler
a full toss outside off, Guptil gives it another thump, driving the ball hard through covers for another boundary
good length and straight, Guptill plays it back to the bowler
that's in the crowd at deep midwicket! Lakmal pitched it short just outside off, Guptill was ready and heaved it with a full swing of the arms, New Zealand off at top speed
a length ball outside off, Williamson dabs the ball late towards backward point to give the strike to Guptill
Guptill is on fire, backing away towards leg and launching the length ball with a flat drive over cover. Smashed it
a slower full ball outside off stump, Guptill backs away towards the leg side again and drags it towards mid-on, bit of a slog that
good length on middle and off, Williamson stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
punched off the back foot to point, a bit of hesitation between the wickets but the batsmen make it, no direct hit at the batsman's end either
Marty Guptill! He's got under a full ball and driven it fiercely over the long off boundary. It was a slower ball but Guptill adjusted well.
Williamson does it again, dabbing the ball efficiently behind point to watch from the non-striker's end
and again! Guptill backs away outside leg stump and drives a full ball from outside off over the wide long off boundary, hit hard and flat
slogs at this one and gets a inside edge towards fine leg
where Guptill uses a axe, Williamson uses a scalpel, dabbing the ball late, opening the face to steer it past the wicketkeeper to the third man boundary
punched off the back foot into the covers
played off the back foot towards third man for a single
bowled flat from around the wicket, driven through covers but there is protection in the deep
shot! Williamson skips down the pitch and lofts the ball so cleanly, just a smooth swing of the arms and it's enough the send the ball towards the sightscreen
played back to the bowler
late cut from in front of middle stump and fairly straight to short third man, Guptill was off in a flash though, he wants the strike!
slapped hard off the back foot but can't beat cover
flicked off the pads to square leg, Guptill has played two consecutive dots!
steps out of his crease and cuts to point, where the fielder dives to make the save
slower ball from Kulasekara, played into the off side
full outside off, driven into the covers
pushed into the covers for a tight single, Guptill was a long way out when Siriwardana's throw missed
lofted over extra cover bit that's not timed well
full and wide outside off, no proper timing to mid-off
moves towards the leg and plays it to the man at cover
played back to the bowler
aims for a slog but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
played back to the bowler
Williamson breaks the lull by lapping a flat and fast delivery behind square leg for four
backs away outside leg and cuts the short ball hard over point, two boundaries to end the over
backs away outside leg and hits the ball firmly through cover
cut late off the back foot but the fielder at backward point dives to his right to save runs
played back to the bowler
goes back and towards leg to cut the ball hard to deep cover
steps out of his crease to get to the pitch of the ball and drives through extra cover
played to extra cover where a fumble allows the single
backs away outside leg stump and drills a full ball to long on
backs away outside leg, Lakmal follows him, cramping Williamson for room, Williamson adjusts by opening the face and steering the ball through point
a low full toss, Guptill clears his front leg and swings the ball to square leg
a rare mis-hit from Williamson, he was looking to play to cover but got an inside edge towards midwicket, the running is sharp
in the blockhole, top delivery, Guptill jams his bat down on the ball and squeezes it out on the leg side

that's so unlucky for the bowler, he bowled a good ball on a tight length, nipping into Williamson from outside off, the batsman prodded from the crease and got an inside edge that ran past the keeper to the fine leg boundary. That was so close to off stump. TV commentators think it grazed the stumps but the bail did not fall
lofted to long off for a single
slogged towards the leg side but not timed well, the ball goes to short fine leg off the bottom edge
reaches out to cut the ball as it spins away from him and is beaten
Williamson's riposte is to skip out to the pitch of the ball and loft it with the turn away from him over cover, sublime timing
clipped off the pads through midwicket
gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball to deep square leg
in the blockhole, the batsman backs away to hit on the off side but can only play it towards the bowler
in the blockhole on middle stump, Guptill clears his front foot to hit on the leg side but gets an inside edge on to his pad, the ball goes towards the keeper, superb ball
I was just going to say that Guptill has lost his touch a bit but he now clears his front foot to a full ball and smashes it over the long on boundary to get to his half-century
yikes, that's a rubbish ball, a full toss on the pads, Guptill stays in his crease and swats it past short fine leg to the boundary
the slower ball in the blockhole, driven to long on for a single
a full and slower ball outside off stump, Williamson drives it off the front foot past the bowler
creates room by moving outside leg and plays the ball through cover point
steps out of his crease to take the ball on the full and drives through cover, New Zealand get to 100
gets down on one knee and slogs the ball to deep midwicket
bowled flat on off and middle, spins into the right-hander, Williamson defends on the off side

a direct hit has nailed Guptill! Williamson played the ball straight to point and called for the single. Guptill responded but hesitated a bit. Kapugedera was good enough to hit the stumps direct and catch Guptill a yard short. There was no run there and Williamson was unhappy with himself
the googly spins away from the left-hander and beats Munro's poke off the back foot
played to long on for a single
driven back to the bowler, a chance for SL to string together some dots to Munro?
played back to the bowler once again
bowled quick into the left-hander from around the wicket, worked off the pads through midwicket
makes room and cuts the ball with the angle across him through point
cut off the back foot to point, only four off that over
hit hard off the back foot through cover
flat and slightly short on leg stump, pulled behind square leg for a single
goes back to drive through cover but gets an edge towards short third man, Williamson races through for the single
full and straight, driven to long on for a single
pushed off the front foot to long on for one more
steps out to try and hit inside out over cover, Dilshan follows Williamson and cramps him for room, ends up mis-timing it to long off
hit firmly through square leg for a single
worked off the pads with the angle into him through square leg
driven to long on for a single, that's his fifty, off 38 balls. He needs to shift up gears now though
hit to long on for one more
full and straight again, in the blockhole, the batsman can only hit it along the ground through midwicket
once again he can't get under the ball to give it any power, driven to long on
and another single, pushed off the back foot through point, NZ are getting stuck here
the lap-sweep to short fine leg, Munro hares down for the single and collides with the keeper Chandimal
slog swept to deep midwicket for ... another single
steps out of his crease and lofts over the infield, can't find the gap at deep midwicket
finally for NZ! Munro gives the bowler the charge and lofts the ball cleanly straight down the ground, this time he managed to get under the full ball. 22 singles before that six
and now he pulls out the reverse hit, smashing the ball behind point for consecutive boundaries. NZ up and running again
Williamson's been caught by Lakmal running in from deep midwicket. He made room by moving outside leg and clips the ball in the air, the timing was not right and that's a straightforward catch
driven hard back at the bowler, who takes the pace off it as it travels to long off
a length ball outside off, driven from the crease through cover for a single
driven hard off the front foot, a low full toss that was, he finds the man at cover though
driven to long off for a single
short ball outside off, Anderson forehands it from his crease to long on
Anderson tries to clear the straight boundary and fails! He cleared his front foot and swung hard, the googly spun away for him so he ended up slicing it to Siriwardana at long off
goes back and towards leg to work the ball off the pads towards deep midwicket, a fumble allows the second to be run easily

he's dropped a sitter! Jayasuriya will want the ground to open up and disappear. Munro reverse swept the ball towards deep point and that ball hung in the air for a while, giving Jayasuriya plenty of time to get under it
Taylor brings out his trademark cut, moving back and cutting late despite the lack of room, the ball races to the backward point boundary
this time he gets a boundary off the outside edge! Taylor was squared up by the legbreak and he prodded, the ball took a thick enough edge to beat the keeper and go to third man
flicked to deep midwicket for a single
Taylor's third boundary in four balls! Moves forward and across to lap-paddle the length ball between the keeper and short fine leg
full and straight, driven to long off for a single
oh my word! There was a long off in place and he had to move only a little to his left to get to that ball but Munro's lofted drive was so powerful that the fielder had no chance
in the blockhole, Munro tries to work it on the leg side but is beaten past leg stump
short ball and it disappears in a blur over deep midwicket, clears his front foot and pulls hard, hitting it flat and powerfully
driven hard into the covers, he's gone if there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but the throw misses
the slower ball goes between the batsman and leg stump, that was 103 kph, Munro had a swing at it but swung too early
caught and bowled! Kulasekara sends down another clever slower ball on a  good length outside off, Munro charged and played too early, he ended up popped it tamely back to the bowler
driven to wide long off for a single, Elliott is away
another slower one on off stump, Taylor leans forward and dabs towards point
flicked off the pads for a single
backs away outside leg and drives the ball hard to cover
shot! Full and wide outside off, there are four men in the circle on the off side but Elliot reaches for the ball and drives it over the infield, plenty of gaps in the deep
full outside off stump again, Elliott drives along the ground through cover but there is protection in the deep this time
Taylor hasn't had much of the strike of late, but he's launched this length ball cleanly over long on with a full swing of the arms on the front foot
in the blockhole outside off stump, Taylor reaches for it and hits it through point
driven into the covers for a quick single, Elliott makes it before Perera can break the stumps
that's too wide outside off stump, that's the first extra of the innings!
in the blockhole to finish, Taylor can only squeeze it back to the bowler
